matlaber 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

matlaber

The goal of matlaber is to provide an interface to Matlab from R. Matlab has to be install locally in order for {matlaber} to work.

Usage

library(matlaber)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'R.oo':
#>   method        from       
#>   throw.default R.methodsS3

mat_run("matlabroot")
#> 
#> --- stdout:
#> 
#> ans =
#> 
#>     'C:\Program Files\MATLAB\R2018b'

mat_run("A = 1")
#> 
#> --- stdout:
#> 
#> A =
#> 
#>      1

Feedback Needed

What do you need an interface to matlab for ? Feel free to get in touch!

Installation

devtools::install_github("matlaber")

Please note that the ‘matlaber’ project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
